description: Main entry point and app setup for a Flutter-based attendance tracking app, including Firebase initialization, routing, and basic UI scaffolding.

classes.name: MyApp
classes.description: Root widget that sets up MaterialApp with routes and theme.

classes.name: SplashRouterGate
classes.description: Stateful widget that decides initial navigation based on authentication state.

classes.name: LoginScreen
classes.description: UI placeholder for user login screen.

classes.name: AttendanceScreen
classes.description: UI placeholder for attendance tracking screen.

classes.name: ReportsScreen
classes.description: UI placeholder for reports and charts.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Application entry point; loads environment, initializes Firebase, and runs the app.

methods.name: _initFirebase
methods.description: Initializes Firebase with environment variables and optional emulator settings.
